title._content: Image taken from page 355 of 'De l'Atlantique au Niger par le Foutah-Djallon. Carnet de voyage ... Dessins de MM. Benett, Dufaux, Lepind, H. Vogel, E. Zier, M. Piriou ... Gravure de F. Méaulle. Avec carte, etc'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "De l'Atlantique au Niger par le Foutah-Djallon. Carnet de voyage ... Dessins de MM. Benett, Dufaux, Lepind, H. Vogel, E. Zier, M. Piriou ... Gravure de F. Méaulle. Avec carte, etc" Author: OLIVIER, Aimé - Count de Sanderval Contributor: BENETT, Léon. Contributor: DUFAUX, L. Contributor: MÉAULLE, F. Contributor: PIRIOU, M. Contributor: VOGEL, Herman - Artist Contributor: ZIER, Édouard. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10096.g.2.", "British Library HMNTS 10097.g.20." Page: 355 Place of Publishing: Paris Date of Publishing: 1882 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002705692 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
